name: Citizenship in the Canadian City
description: Who belongs? Who governs? Who decides? In this course you will examine the concepts of citizenship, public space, political membership, civic responsibility, and belonging. You will address topics such as Aboriginal sovereignty claims, urban multiculturalism, public housing, and greening the city. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
exclusions: Innis One, Munk One, New One, St. Mike's One, Trinity One, Vic One, Woodsworth One
